name: Neon Bricks: Demo
description:
Old-school neon arcanoid with a bunch of bricks to crush. Simple to learn, hard to master. Hit the ball, destroy bricks, collect bonuses and enjoy the wonderful views.

The Demo version contains one chapter which consists of 10 colorful levels.

Special thanks:

To all who supported us during the YoYo Games game jam and to all our friends who participated in the closed beta test.
